name: Alice
title: alice.tech
shortDescription: Alice is an AI-powered study tool designed to enhance learning by converting uploaded materials into tailored notes and exercises. It's ideal for students who want to optimize their study time by focusing on areas that need improvement. For example, a student can upload lecture slides, and Alice will generate practice questions and summaries to help reinforce learning.
pros: Offers a free tier with limited usage
cons: Dependent on quality of uploaded materials
May not cover all academic subjects
